reviews.content: Love it, this mixed with OneCast is the bees knees! Pay the money!!! THROW IT AT HIM!! NOW!!!!
When you want a nice tweak this is perfect for you.
Overall it’s a great tweak love using my Dualshock 4 to play games when I’m out and have a bit of time to kill. Worth the money!
Working on unc0ver, iOS 12.4. Connected two Dualshock  PS4 controllers with DolphiniOS!
Working so far on ducktales, streets of rage 2, sonic 1 from the App Store. Haven’t tried it with emulators such as provenance. No vibration however. iPhone XS 12.1.1 b3
